EmailTemplate.subject: NCS – Important Timetable Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS – Important Timetable Change Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Due to unforeseen circumstances, we have had to change the outdoor centre for the first part of your NCS programme.
You will now be staying at Gwent Outdoor Education Centre Gilwern, in Gilwern, Gwent, Wales .
The meeting point for Saturday 23 July is still the same.
Please click here to see your updated timetable: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/assets/Walsall_B_Su_8__TT.pdf
If you have any questions, please do get in touch with us on the details below.
We look forward to seeing you on NCS!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
